item.title: Kotyark Industries Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Robust Buying Pressure
item.description: Kotyark Industries Ltd, a micro-cap player in the power sector, surged to hit its upper circuit limit on 4 February 2026, registering a maximum daily gain of 9.99% to close at ₹211.95. This sharp rally was driven by strong buying interest and a significant rise in investor participation, signalling renewed market confidence despite the company’s recent downgrade to a Sell rating by MarketsMOJO. Time: 13 minutes ago

Time: 13 minutes ago
